amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to enforce a federal court decision that stopped implementation of the 2014 EA and take permit plan for double-crested cormorants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 87 printed in House Report 114-683 to prevent funds from being used to enforce a federal court decision that stopped implementation of the 2014 EA and take permit plan for double-crested cormorants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Westerman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A072) Agreed to by voice vote.
